text: (And (Solomon) smiled, laughing) in amazement (at her speech) because he heard her speech while his army did not, (and said: My Lord, arouse me) inspire in me (to be thankful for Thy favour wherewith Thou hast favoured me) you have blessed me with the profession of Allah's divine Oneness (and my parents) whom you also blessed with the profession of Allah's divine Oneness, (and to do good) in all sincerity (that shall be pleasing unto Thee) that you would accept (and include me in (the number of) Thy righteous slaves) and include me with Your righteous slaves in Paradise.
